member.name: ID2D1HwndRenderTarget.CheckWindowState
member.summary: Indicates whether the HWND associated with this render target is occluded.
member.returns: A value that indicates whether the HWND associated with this render target is occluded.

member.name: ID2D1HwndRenderTarget.GetHwnd
member.summary: Returns the HWND associated with this render target.
member.returns: The HWND associated with this render target.

member.name: ID2D1HwndRenderTarget.Resize
member.summary: Changes the size of the render target to the specified pixel size.
member.param: The new size of the render target in device pixels.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1HwndRenderTarget.Resize
member.summary: Changes the size of the render target to the specified pixel size.
member.param: The new size of the render target in device pixels.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1HwndRenderTarget
member.summary: Renders drawing instructions to a window.
